native_settings_activation_tank_descript: Whether to use the tank activation feature by native settings; can be used without virtual car deelaer.
native_settings_activation_aldecaldos_de: It will be reflected in the vehicle list. If you have already opened the vehicle list, please close it.
native_settings_activation_militech_desc: It will be reflected in the vehicle list. If you have already opened the vehicle list, please close it.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_autopilo: Switches the autopilot ON/OFF. Pressing this button during autopilot will interrupt it.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_door_des: You can operate the opening and closing of the door.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_radio_de: Switches the radio ON/OFF. If you press and hold it for a while before releasing, the radio port will open.
native_settings_keybinds_toggle_crystal_: Switches the crystal dome ON/OFF. Exclusive to Excalibur and Manticore.
